name: Caverns of Darkness patch for ZDoom
description: A small patch for ZDoom to play : Caverns of Darkness by the Chaos Crew. : This mod requires a customized EXE which : unfortunately is a DOS version that causes : massive problems with newer Windows XP systems : This patch allows to play this WAD with a modern : source port : : This is hopefully the final version of this patch : It is the first one only using officially documented : ZDoom features to achieve its goal.
